Class VoteSorter

  • java.lang.Object
    • VoteSorter

  • public class VoteSorter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that sorts the votes, classifies them as valid or not and stores them in the corresponding positions
    Author:
    Daniel Rodriguez Garcia
